channel.title: davewiner tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from davewiner.

item.description: BTW -- I couldn't believe my ears when I heard @maddow say the other night, in passing, this gem. "assuming the Dems lose congress, as expected" That is like your doctor saying: "If you die of cancer in November, as expected" When you don't even have cancer, knock wood.
People who blame the Dems for things only voters control have their heads up their butts.
@ashur you're talking about a reader that doesn't import or export opml files?
@ashur i don't understand the last part -- "that doesnâ€™t otherwise support the service"
Does anyone believe that with journalism as it is, we will be able to manage the climate crisis without huge lost of human life.

If you're working on an RSS reader, you should allow users to subscribe to OPML files. It should be a standard feature in RSS reader apps.
If you have questions or comments, this is the place..
https://t.co/ExRBtff7mo
Think of this as a persistent import.
When the OPML file is updated, the changes percolate to all users who subscribe to it.
It's exactly analogous to lists in Twitter (and predate lists in Twitter, btw).

@peterwil in the meantime you're playing with fire, if the repubs control the house that's it, our democracy is finished there won't be another election. i've heard it said there's no memory of fascism with most people in the US. my parents and grandparents taught me about it.

@peterwil I don't get that. I think the answer is to elect more democrats not fewer. If there were a couple more dems in the senate they would have passed the biden agenda, and according to your first tweet you'd be happy.

@peterwil shaking my head in disbelief.
@peterwil just curious, are you going to vote republican in the november election?

This song by Paul McCartney wrote this song to be recorded by the Beatles, but instead it was part of his first solo album. I love the song and think it would have been a classic Beatles song. https://t.co/6IqFGWrXHd
The critics hated the album. Just shows how wrong people can be. It's got a bunch of lovely songs they would have loved if they had been part of a Beatles album, imho of course.

Why are Republicans gaining? They're fascists. They want to reinstate slavery. They're going to force women to carry unwanted pregnancies. They want to kill our health care, and steal our retirement savings. Something is wrong with this picture.

@mathewi I figure if my Tesla can sense a human standing on the curb and slow down as my car goes by, Twitter can detect a troll's tweet, and warn you about it or even not show it to you at all (subject to a preference of course).
